content: Phase 3.1: Implement apply_smart_format_discovery to consolidate Tiers 3+4
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings from smart format discovery implementation
Phase 3.2: Update tiered_type_format_discovery to use new consolidated approach
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings from tiered discovery updates

Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings -W clippy::all -W clippy::pedantic -W clippy::nursery -W clippy::cargo -A clippy::multiple_crate_versions -A clippy::cargo_common_metadata
Fix any clippy issues following rules: no dead_code attributes, no underscore prefixes
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
Task a new subagent to do code review focusing on duplication and complexity (read-only analysis)
Review suggested changes from code review subagent with user
